Method Detail

newFileLocation

ResourceFileLocation newFileLocation(String path,
                                     LocationFactory.Compression compression,
                                     LocationFactory.Location location)
                                     throws IOException
Create a new ResourceFileLocation from the provided path, compression type and the location (i.e. HTTP, FTP or Local_FS)

Parameters:
path - the path to the resource
compression - type of compression used
location - location on the file system
Returns:
instance of a ResourceFileLocation that is open-able given the parameters
Throws:
IOException
